content:
I'm glad you remembered. You can add David to your list:

* Emily: Office party carpool
* Michael: Check-in
* Christine: New apartment
* Alex: Business venture
* Laura: Birthday
* David: Backyard BBQ plans (July)

Remember to review your list periodically to ensure you're staying on top of your social connections. It's great that you're making an effort to stay in touch with your friends and acquaintances!

If you need any more assistance or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your follow-ups go smoothly, and you have a great time at the office party and David's backyard BBQ!
